content: the first 3/4 of this pattern is pure laziness you could knit it anywhere no pattern no measuring just one long tube work out the details later they ll be great for knitting while doing other things the last quarter is where you add easy after-thought heels toes and cuffs and where you decide who the socks should fit these socks are great for * using up every last scrap of a precious yarn * kids whose feet grow before you re half-finished * keeping the stripes or color pooling *regular* at least * knitting without needing to concentrate easily customized for different yarn weights and foot diameters
